roleset.name: lose value
roleset.note: DEPRECIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'depreciate' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from depreciate.01-v predicate notes)
DEPRECIATION-N NOTES: Based on Ontonotes nouns. Comparison to depreciate.01-v. Depreciate.01 is a member of VN class calibratable_cos-45.6-1.Framed by Katie. (from depreciation.01-n)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Since 1984, more companies give sales-loss aid, as many real-estate values depreciated, the council says.
